name: Put The Circle
description:
This game developed for the (Oneix GameJam) the theme of jam is "stop time" so i made a game like a  circle want to go to its place

It has a device that stops time for a certain period of time

There are many enemies and secrets in the game

you can know the secrets by download the game and play it

Note : Look at The screenshots to know how the game look

 ---------------------------------------------------------

Control :  MoveUp : W, UpArrow MoveDown : S, DownArrow MoveRight : D, RightArrow MoveLeft : A, LeftArrow  you can stop the time by holding: LeftShift,X, Mouse0(Left mouse button)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

I know the game is not perfect but its good because i developed this game in just 2 days

please if you download the game complete it to the end 

I got fun in this GameJam and thank you Oneix
